The probability of income level being low (B=0) is 0.8070. For those with temperature being high (C=1) and income level being high (B=1), the probability of stress level being low (D=0) is 0.8723. The probability of income level being high (B=1) is 0.1930. The probability of stress level being low (D=0) is 0.6253. The probability of temperature being low (C=0) and stress level being low (D=0) is 0.1945.

Questions.Instruction: Consider the probability of sufficiency (PS) of temperature on stress level.
Questions.Question: Given that temperature was low and stress level was low, what is the lower bound of the probability that stress level would have been high if the temperature had been high?
